About Jiffyprints

Serving Toronto and all of Canada with professional embroidery and printing services since 2014.

Our Story

Founded in 2014, Jiffyprints began with a simple mission: to provide businesses and individuals with high-quality custom embroidery and printing services that they could count on. What started as a small Toronto-based operation has grown into a trusted partner for customers across Canada.

Our focus has always been on embroidery excellence. We believe that embroidered designs offer unmatched durability and professional appearance, making them perfect for corporate uniforms, team apparel, and promotional items that need to withstand frequent use and washing.

Over the years, we've expanded our services to include DTF printing, DTG printing, and screen printing, but embroidery remains at the heart of what we do. Our commitment to quality, fast turnaround times, and personalized service has made us the go-to choice for businesses across Canada.

Why Experience Matters

With over 10 years in the industry, we've seen trends come and go, but quality never goes out of style. Our experience means:

  • Expert advice on the best approach for your project
  • Knowledge of what works and what doesn't in embroidery
  • Established relationships with suppliers for consistent quality
  • Refined processes that ensure efficiency and accuracy
  • Problem-solving skills from handling thousands of projects

Our Commitment

We're committed to being your trusted partner for all your embroidery and printing needs. This means:

Quality Guarantee

Every item is inspected for quality before shipping. If you're not satisfied, we'll make it right.

Fair Pricing

Competitive, transparent pricing with no hidden fees. You know exactly what you're paying for.

Clear Communication

Regular updates on your project status and quick responses to any questions or concerns.

Continuous Improvement

We're always looking for ways to improve our services and stay current with industry trends.

Ready to Work Together?

Experience the difference that 10+ years of expertise can make for your next embroidery or printing project.
